knimeNode.name: Range Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes rows where certain parameter values are outside of a defined range.

fullDescription.intro: This is a commodity node to batch filter columns of a normalized table. Each parameter will be searched for values lying outside the defined bounds.
fullDescription.option: Number defining the lower limit of the possible parameter value range
Number defining the upper limit of the possible parameter value range
Column filter to select the paramters where the values are checked to lie inside the defined range.

Per default unchecked. In this case an row is removed if it has value outside of the range for at least one parameter. If you tick this checkbox, the row is only removed if all the values for all parameter are outside the range.

ports.outPort: table with rows inside the range.
table with rows outside the range.
